title: Played a game on EUW in German. Changed client back to NA English. Problem ensues.
body:
As soon as I open the client, it gives me an ambiguous error message that says the client has reverted to the last patch and will attempt to re-patch. It never tries to re-patch, and just sits there, stagnating and wasting my time, not allowing me to join any games. I am currently running a "full repair," but if my past experiences with client issues still bear relevance, this will not help anything. Re-patching with the Hextech repair tool has done nothing. Help would be very much appreciated.

UPDATE: The "full repair" tool has repaired nothing. The full text in the pop-up is "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." As I said prior, it does nothing.

replies.body: When you switch regions on the client, it will need to download those languages packs among a few resources. When you switched back to NA it seems like those files didn't download correctly. I know you mentioned that the repair tool didn't do anything, but make sure you checked **force repatch** and let it run to completion. If that doesn't get it patched up, you might need to adjust some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure the patcher is able to grab the patch from our servers.
